body_html: @randxie , I am currently using the workaround provided by @Cadene, which works fine, but I was thinking it could be good to properly resolve this issue. I am still confused about why it arises, unfortunately, and therefore also on how it should be fixed. (But at least there is a very small amount of code involved, so it should not be hard to figure out.) Do you understand what is going on? Any chance your recent PR #2796 addressing issue #1488 might fix this problem as well?
